General.Name: Vitania Ltd
General.Description: Vitania Ltd. engages in planning, development, construction, betterment, and leasing of real estate properties in Israel. Its properties include office, commercial, residential buildings, and assisted living facilities. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
General.Address: 4 Raoul Wallenberg Street, Tel Aviv, Israel, 69719
